author: The Film Theorists
description:
There’s a secret map on the back of The Declaration of Independence written in invisible ink, at least that’s what Nick Cage’s character in National Treasure believes. And while the usage of invisible ink is (historically) accurate, Nick’s scientific method is not.
‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐
*Credits:*
Writers: Forrest Lee
Editor: AbsolutePixel
Sound Designer: Yosi Berman
